attributes.action: Introduce a bank holiday to mark the covid pandemic & as a tribute to NHS staff
attributes.additional_details: The Covid pandemic has been a major historic  crisis and we should mark the efforts of those who have sacrificed their time and their lives to help others. We should never forget what the country has been through & celebrate the achievement of those who have helped us to resolve it.
attributes.background: Introduce a new bank holiday to commemorate the Covid pandemic and as a tribute to front line health workers & all others who have sacrificed
